attributes.action: link MP's pay directly to the relevant civil service pay scale.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MP's seem to be unique amongst public servants in that they can vote for their own pay. To the man in the street this smacks of unfairness. A better approach would be to select an appropriate civil service grade for MPs, ministers etc. and pay them that sum. Any wage increments applied to civil servants also apply to MPs. 

This will appear much fairer to the general public.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
